hard_constraints.description: Bin capacity compliance rules mandate that the cumulative weight of all items assigned to a single bin must not exceed the defined maximum capacity.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- item(B, _), capacity(N), W = #sum { Weight, I : assigned(I, B), item(I, Weight) }, W > N.

soft_constraints.description: Operational efficiency policies require that the logistics plan minimizes the total number of distinct bins utilized to reduce resource overhead.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: used(B) :- assigned(_, B). penalty("MinimizeUsedBins", B, 1) :- used(B).

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Name, B : penalty(Name, B, Cost) }.
